T_DTY_BEG_DATE`, `NEXT_DTY_BEG_TIME`|`NEXT_DTY_BEG_DATE` + `NEXT_DTY_BEG_TIME`| |startDateLocal| | |N/A in the source system.| |endDateLocal| | |N/A in the source system.| |departureFlightLegId| | |N/A in the source system.| |arrivalFlightLegId| | |N/A in the source system.| |distanceFromStation| | |N/A in the source system.| |durationFromStation|`XCREW.MLOG$_HOTEL_RESERVATION hres`, `XCREW.HOTEL_AT_AIRPORT haa`|`hres.RESERVATION_DATE`, `hres.HOTEL_ID`, `haa.HOTEL_ID`, `haa.VALID_SINCE`, `haa.VALID_UNTIL`, `haa.LENGTH_FOR_PICKUP`|when `hres.HOTEL_ID` = `haa.HOTEL_ID` and
`haa.VALID_SINCE` <= `hres.RESERVATION_DATE` and `haa.VALID_UNTIL` >= `hres.RESERVATION_DATE`
then `haa.LENGTH_FOR_PICKUP`| |status|`XCREW.MLOG$_HOTEL_RESERVATION`|`DMLTYPE$$`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_HOTEL_RESERVATION.DMLTYPE$$` = “D“
then “CANCELLED“ else “ACTIVE“| |hotelName|`XCREW.HOTEL`|`NAME`| | |hotelPhone|`XCREW.HOTEL`|`PHONE`| | |hotelEmail|`XCREW.HOTEL`|`EMAIL_ADDRESS`, `EMAIL_ADDRESS_2`|`XCREW.HOTEL.EMAIL_ADDRESS` +
when `XCREW.HOTEL.EMAIL_ADDRESS_2` is not null and
`XCREW.HOTEL.EMAIL_ADDRESS_2` <> “ “
then “, “ + `XCREW.HOTEL.EMAIL_ADDRESS_2` else ““| |hotelAddress|`XCREW.HOTEL`|`CITY_NAME`, `STREET`, `ZIP_CODE`|`XCREW.HOTEL.CITY_NAME` +
when `XCREW.HOTEL.STREET` is not null
then “, “ + `XCREW.HOTEL.STREET` else ““ +
when `XCREW.HOTEL.ZIP_CODE` is not null
then “, “ + `XCREW.HOTEL.ZIP_CODE` else ““| # Crew Simulator Flights Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * :paperclip: Duty Item MLOG Data Retrieval #### - Source Query * :paperclip: Duty Item MLOG Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger:** :paperclip: Duty Item MLOG Data Retrieval **Steps:** :paperclip: Duty Item MLOG Data Retrieval #### - Data Handling Operation * Crew Simulator Flights data is sorted based on `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.SEQUENCE$$` field to ensure that it is the same as the processing order in the source system. * `rosterId` is retrieved from Crew Roster usin
